com.adobe.cq.social.srp.internal

Interface SocialIndexer


  • @ProviderType
public interface SocialIndexer
    Interface that should be implemented by anybody who wants the social ugc data to be indexed for better efficient searching EG: Solr, ElasticSearch, etc

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String REPORT_SUITE
      To allow sharding on tenant id.

    • Field Detail

      • REPORT_SUITE

        static final java.lang.String REPORT_SUITE
        To allow sharding on tenant id. Uses reportSuite from configuration
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
